column1: Little Goat Diner////Very delicious sandwich I had here for dinner! My friend and I ended up near the West Loop. Although we had initially intended on getting dinner elsewhere
column2: I'm so happy we got to eat at Little Goat Diner! We got there around 5PM and thankfully there wasn't a wait for us to get seated. The menu online is cutely presented
column3: and I wish I could have tried more after finding out that this is the sister restaurant of the infamous Girl and the Goat across the street!!
